title: Strawberry Kannae Song Lyrics Minsara Kanavu
stanzas:
strawberry kannae,
vinveli pennae
silver spoon kaiyoadu
pirandhaval neeyae
oru fridge’kul apple
poal irundhaval neeyae

thanga thattil soaru
benz-u ac paaru,
irundhu nenjoadu
sollaadha baaram enna?

thanimai inimaiyaaga
ilamai kudumaiyaaga
unadhu kannoadu
sollaadha soagam enna?

strawberry kannae,
vinveli pennae
silver spoon kaiyoadu
pirandhaval neeyae
oru fridge’kul apple
poal irundhaval neeyae

thanga thattil soaru
benz-u ac paaru,
irundhu nenjoadu
sollaadha baaram enna?

thanimai inimaiyaaga
ilamai kudumaiyaaga
unadhu kannoadu
sollaadha soagam enna?

pazhaiya paithiyam
paithiyam naanum illai
unadhu vaithiyam
vaithiyam thaevai illai
enadhu munnavar
yaarumae model illai (?)
en nenjinil kuzhappam illai

kanavan saevaiyil
saevaiyil inbam illai
manidha saevaiyil
saergaiyil thunbam illai

naan yaarukkum
boomiyil baaram illai
en paadhayil irulum illai

naetru kaadhal kondu,
indru kanavan kondu
naalai aduppilae
 vendhida aasai illai

mudhalil maalai soottum,
piragu vilangum poottum
ungal kasamusa
kalyaanam thaevai illai

enna kangal enna kangal
enna kannam enna kannam
thangam poosiya
thaamarai kannam
enna udhadu enna udhadu
cherry pazham poal
sivandha udhadu

aaaahhunnn… nose dhaan
konjam over size
its ok ma,
plastic surgery pannikuvoam

en mookkai enakku periyadhaaga
padaithavan evano
unadhu moolai alavai
siriyadhaaga padaithavan avanae
neeyoru purushana
monkiyaa manushana?
